================
### Title
Modification to the Deslauriers Island Alignment Fixed Aid to Navigation

### Reference Number
CB-126-22085178

### Solicitation Number
30004840

### Publication Date
February 21, 2024

### Tender Closing Date
March 7, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

### Description of Work
The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) invites bids for the construction and installation of a new reinforced concrete foundation and a grounding loop for a navigational aid tower. This project aims to mitigate the effects of climate change and erosion on the existing structure on Deslauriers Island. The proposed tower will be built on Sainte-Thérèse Island to ensure continuity of service.

### Scope of Work
The selected contractor will be responsible for:

*   Building a reinforced concrete foundation on piles
*   Installing a grounding loop around the foundation
*   Ensuring site accessibility for machinery during construction

### Key Dates
The expected start date for the contract is May 13, 2024. The expected completion date is June 14, 2024.

### Solicitation Method
This is a request for proposal based on the lowest price.

### Regional Requirement
The project is specific to Quebec, excluding the National Capital Region.

### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
